title: Week 4
text:
Ponder






🤔



Dyadic and Triadic Structure
Chapter 13 (“Dyads”) and 14 (“Triads”) from Wasserman, S., & Faust K. (1994). Social Network Analysis. Cambridge University Press.
Chapter 7 (“Dyads and Triads”) from Rawlings C. et al. (2023). Online Appendix to Network Analysis: Integrating Social Network Theory, Method, and Application with R Cambridge University Press.
Exponential Random Graph Models
Chapter 33 (“Random Graph Models”) from Levey et al. (2024). The Sage Handbook of Social Network Analysis. Sage.
Network Dynamics
Chapter 34 (“Network Dynamics”) from McLevey et al. (2024). The Sage Handbook od Social Network Analysis.
